rules_text:
{B}{B}, Sacrifice a land: Excavate. [i](Put the bottom card of your library into your graveyard. If it's a land card, put a colorless artifact token named Loot onto the battlefield. It has ‘Sacrifice this artifact: Add {1} to your mana pool.')[/i]
{3}{B}{B}, Exile a land card from your graveyard: Destroy target nonbasic land. Its controller loses 2 life.
